channel.title: Tor / whonixcheck Stable Upgrades - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/tor-whonixcheck-stable-upgrades-testers-wanted
Tor was updated to 0.2.8.9-1~d80.jessie+1 and whonixcheck was updated to 3:4.6.4-1 in Whonix stable-proposed-updates as well as in testers repository.
  • Tor 0.2.8.9 is released, with important fixes
  • whonixcheck fixes the /etc/perl/sitecustomize.pl apparmor warning
Instructions for chaneing Whonix repository: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-APT-Repository Then just do a update: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Update

item.title: Tor / whonixcheck Stable Upgrades - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No more testing required.

Migrated into stable repository.

Read full topic

item.title: Tor / whonixcheck Stable Upgrades - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: minimal
item.description:
Hello!

As requested, I’ve been running the stable-proposed-updates during the last three days.

Operative System:

Qubes 3.2

Running Whonix VMs:

  1. sys-Whonix: a crucial element in my Qubes infrastructure, since I use it for upgrading all the templates.

  2. anon-Whonix: browsing (Tor Browser 6.5a3-hardened)

  3. irc: chatting with friends.

Corridor:

Yes

AppArmor:

Yes

Kind of tests performed:

Daily use + Whonix Check on any single VM.

Results:

No issues or anomalies detected. My laptop is running just fine.

That’s it!

However, if the Whonix team need to know something of more specific, I will be glad to help.

Cheers

Read full topic
item.source: Tor / whonixcheck Stable Upgrades - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Tor / whonixcheck Stable Upgrades - Testers Wanted!

item.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/tor-whonixcheck-stable-upgrades-testers-wanted

Tor was updated to 0.2.8.9-1~d80.jessie+1 and whonixcheck was updated to 3:4.6.4-1 in Whonix stable-proposed-updates as well as in testers repository.

  • Tor 0.2.8.9 is released, with important fixes
  • whonixcheck fixes the /etc/perl/sitecustomize.pl apparmor warning
Instructions for chaneing Whonix repository: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-APT-Repository

Then just do a update:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Update
